member.name: T:Dynamicweb.Ecommerce.SalesDiscounts.ShippingDiscount.ShippingDiscount
member.summary: Represents shipping method discount The shipping method discount lets you apply a discount to orders where the customer has chosen a certain shipping method E.g. the customer has chosen one of your preferred shipping partners and gets a 2 percent discount

member.name: M:Dynamicweb.Ecommerce.SalesDiscounts.ShippingDiscount.ShippingDiscount.ProcessOrder(Dynamicweb.Ecommerce.Orders.Order)
member.summary: Processes order by adding discount line to order lines

member.name: M:Dynamicweb.Ecommerce.SalesDiscounts.ShippingDiscount.ShippingDiscount.GetOptions(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves options as order fields or shipping method
member.returns: HashTable with SystemName and Name of order field or ID and Name of shipping method
